KSGenGeneratorSimulationBuilder.h
1 #ifndef Kassiopeia_KSGenGeneratorSimulationBuilder_h_
2 #define Kassiopeia_KSGenGeneratorSimulationBuilder_h_
3 
4 #include "KComplexElement.hh"
5 #include "KSGenGeneratorSimulation.h"
6 #include "KToolbox.h"
7 
8 using namespace Kassiopeia;
9 namespace katrin
10 {
11 
12  typedef KComplexElement< KSGenGeneratorSimulation > KSGenGeneratorSimulationBuilder;
13 
14  template< >
15  inline bool KSGenGeneratorSimulationBuilder::AddAttribute( KContainer* aContainer )
16  {
17  if( aContainer->GetName() == "name" )
18  {
19  aContainer->CopyTo( fObject, &KNamed::SetName );
20  return true;
21  }
22  // path to the existing simulation output file (e.g. base="DipoleTrapSimulation.root")
23  if( aContainer->GetName() == "base" )
24  {
25  aContainer->CopyTo( fObject, &KSGenGeneratorSimulation::SetBase );
26  return true;
27  }
28  if( aContainer->GetName() == "path" )
29  {
30  aContainer->CopyTo( fObject, &KSGenGeneratorSimulation::SetPath );
31  return true;
32  }
33  // formulas to adjust the generated values (e.g. energy="x + 18600")
34  if( aContainer->GetName() == "position_x" )
35  {
36  aContainer->CopyTo( fObject, &KSGenGeneratorSimulation::SetPositionX );
37  return true;
38  }
39  if( aContainer->GetName() == "position_y" )
40  {
41  aContainer->CopyTo( fObject, &KSGenGeneratorSimulation::SetPositionY );
42  return true;
43  }
44  if( aContainer->GetName() == "position_z" )
45  {
46  aContainer->CopyTo( fObject, &KSGenGeneratorSimulation::SetPositionZ );
47  return true;
48  }
49  if( aContainer->GetName() == "direction_x" )
50  {
51  aContainer->CopyTo( fObject, &KSGenGeneratorSimulation::SetDirectionX );
52  return true;
53  }
54  if( aContainer->GetName() == "direction_y" )
55  {
56  aContainer->CopyTo( fObject, &KSGenGeneratorSimulation::SetDirectionY );
57  return true;
58  }
59  if( aContainer->GetName() == "direction_z" )
60  {
61  aContainer->CopyTo( fObject, &KSGenGeneratorSimulation::SetDirectionZ );
62  return true;
63  }
64  if( aContainer->GetName() == "energy" )
65  {
66  aContainer->CopyTo( fObject, &KSGenGeneratorSimulation::SetEnergy );
67  return true;
68  }
69  if( aContainer->GetName() == "time" )
70  {
71  aContainer->CopyTo( fObject, &KSGenGeneratorSimulation::SetTime );
72  return true;
73  }
74  // names of the generator/terminator to select tracks (e.g. terminator="term_detector")
75  if( aContainer->GetName() == "terminator" )
76  {
77  aContainer->CopyTo( fObject, &KSGenGeneratorSimulation::SetTerminator );
78  return true;
79  }
80  if( aContainer->GetName() == "generator" )
81  {
82  aContainer->CopyTo( fObject, &KSGenGeneratorSimulation::SetGenerator );
83  return true;
84  }
85  // name of the track group to use (e.g. track_group="output_track_world")
86  if( aContainer->GetName() == "track_group" )
87  {
88  aContainer->CopyTo( fObject, &KSGenGeneratorSimulation::SetTrackGroupName );
89  return true;
90  }
91  // names of the track components to use (e.g. position_field="final_position")
92  if( aContainer->GetName() == "position_field" )
93  {
94  aContainer->CopyTo( fObject, &KSGenGeneratorSimulation::SetPositionName );
95  return true;
96  }
97  if( aContainer->GetName() == "momentum_field" )
98  {
99  aContainer->CopyTo( fObject, &KSGenGeneratorSimulation::SetMomentumName );
100  return true;
101  }
102  if( aContainer->GetName() == "kinetic_energy_field" )
103  {
104  aContainer->CopyTo( fObject, &KSGenGeneratorSimulation::SetKineticEnergyName );
105  return true;
106  }
107  if( aContainer->GetName() == "time_field" )
108  {
109  aContainer->CopyTo( fObject, &KSGenGeneratorSimulation::SetTimeName );
110  return true;
111  }
112  if( aContainer->GetName() == "pid_field" )
113  {
114  aContainer->CopyTo( fObject, &KSGenGeneratorSimulation::SetPIDName );
115  return true;
116  }
117  return false;
118  }
119 
120 }
121 #endif
